section.section: The Comptroller may not allow a warrant to be issued until a record is made in the books of the Office of the Comptroller.

The record shall:
state the amount of the warrant;
state the account against which the warrant is charged; and
identify:
the payee and the officer or unit of the State government that submitted the bill; or
for an advance, the officer or unit.

text.section: The Comptroller shall keep an abstract of each warrant.
